section.title: Important Notices
section.p: Before posting a question or problem to any mailing list, please first look at the following resources:

ul.li: Cocoon Links for pointers to general XML and XSL and Java related resources. Please do not ask such questions here unless they are related to Forrest.
Mailing list archives - a veritable goldmine of Forrest-specific information.

section.p: If you are posting about a problem that you are having, it will aid in finding a speedy resolution if you provide full configuration details, including the version number, your operating system, JDK version, and servlet engine, and full details of any errors encountered including full error messages and stack traces.

section.title: Forrest User
section.p: Purpose: Any genral issue related to the day-to-day use of Forrest.
Note: This is a subscriber-only list (in an effort to stop spam), so you must join before you can post.

section.title: Forrest Dev
section.p: Purpose: Any issue related to development and enhancement.
Note: This is a subscriber-only list (in an effort to stop spam), so you must join before you can post.
Read-only NNTP access to forrest-dev is available through the gmane.text.xml.forrest.devel newsgroup
Note: If sending code patches, then please add PATCH to the subject line and use diff -u format.

section.title: Forrest CVS
section.p: Purpose: Receive notifications on changes in the Forrest codebase in CVS. Note that these cvs log messages are also automatically sent to the forrest-dev mailing list.
